    GhostCalculator.computeGhostY(int[][] boardMatrix, Brick brick, int brickX, int brickY, int boardHeight, int currentShapeIndex)
    Computes the final Y-coordinate where the current falling brick would land if it were to drop instantly (the "ghost" piece position).
